divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and myself were outside when i saw a star. I mentioned it and discussed it when it launched straight up into the air and headed towards us. popping out from over the trees. several more proceeded to do the same. I have never seen anything like this before in my life! I am sitting inside now watching from my window watching another plan fly with the same red and blue light on either side of the diamond shape plane with a red strobe !!!!!!!! shaped like that started in the middle and strobed either way at the same time.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mansfield
There were no other sightings in Mansfield on or around August 1st 2007
Summary: square shaped obejects like diamonds flying eratically in large group real stealthy strobes blue and red solid light
